channel.title: CVE Feed for Genetech Solutions -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Genetech Solutions -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-4544|2024-05-24T03:30:34.564Z -- Genetech Solutions -- Pie Register - Social Sites Login (Add on)
item.description: The Pie Register - Social Sites Login (Add on) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 1.7.7. This is due to insufficient verification on the user being supplied during a social login through the plugin. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to log in as any existing user on the site, such as an administrator, if they have access to the email.

item.title: CVE-2024-4544|2024-05-24T03:30:34.564Z -- Genetech Solutions -- Pie Register - Social Sites Login (Add on)
